  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    TransactionError
    An instance of TransactionError is thrown whenever it occurs a situation that prevents a transaction from committing.
    WriteOnReadError
    An instance of WriteOnReadError is thrown whenever a write attempt is made within a read-only transaction.
